name: smartBackend
label: Authorize
description: Retrieves Access Token using SMART Backend Services Authorization
returnDescription: Returns access token in a string variable

attributes.name: url
attributes.label: Base URL
attributes.description: e.g. https://{hostname}/{instance}/ e.g. for EPIC sandbox https://fhir.epic.com/interconnect-fhir-oauth/

attributes.name: tokenEndpoint
attributes.label: Token Endpoint
attributes.description: e.g. oauth2/token for FHIR EPIC sandbox

attributes.name: pemFile
attributes.label: Private Key File (.pem)
attributes.description: Private Key file associated with the RSA public key used to register the application with the FHIR server
